title: Missing people & silent suspects - The cases of mom Joleen Cummings & little Owen Hidalgo-Cameron
itunes:title: Missing people & silent suspects - The cases of mom Joleen Cummings & little Owen Hidalgo-Cameron
description:
A woman suspected in the disappearance of a Florida hair stylist sits in jail, refusing to share details -- if she knows them -- of what happened to Joleen Cummings. Kimberly Kessler was the last known person to see the mom of 3. Nancy Grace examines the latest evidence updates the search for Cummings with Cold Case Research Institute director Sheryl McCollum, forensic psychiatrist Dr. Daniel Bober, and CrimeOnline.com reporter Leigh Egan. The search for 1-year-old Owen Hidalgo-Calerdon, missing since his mother was found dead in Upstate New York last month, has ended in frustration. The mother's ex-boyfriend admitted to burying Selena Hidalgo-Calderon, but he has not admitted to killing her. Reporter John Lemley joins Grace to update the case.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
